google_translated: Hikari of a blue star that lives in a longing

en_text: the light that we love helplessly
jp_text: ただ僕らは恋をして
google_translated: Just we are in love

en_text: We sacrifice all we have at our disposal
jp_text: たったひとつの未来の為に
google_translated: For only one future

en_text: for the only future we have left
jp_text: 今の全て奏でている
google_translated: All now play

en_text: I will stand next to you
jp_text: 側に立って　同じ彼方へ手を伸ばすよ
google_translated: Stand up and reach the same side

en_text: One day, I might be able
jp_text: 君が信じた静かな空に
google_translated: In the quiet sky that you believed

en_text: to see the sky you put so much faith into:
jp_text: いつか僕も届くだろう
google_translated: Someday I will arrive
